import axios from "axios" import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const Cards = () => { const [movies, setMovies] = React.useState([]) React.useEffect(() => { axios.get("/api/movies/popular") .then((info) => info.data) .then((res) => setMovies(res.results)) }, []) console.log(movies) return ( <> {movies.map((data) => {

{/* */}

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

Fecha de lanzamiento:

{movie.release_date}

})} ) } export default Cards;
